BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/merch/catalog/omt-atr/master/"
TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/merch/catalog/omt-atr-val/master/"
TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH = "opco/{opco}/integration/category/category-consumer/master"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 5.0
KEY_COL = "attributeId"
VAR_ATR_ID = 71
VAR_ATR_TYPE_CD = 'C'
OPCO = "fdln"

logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t Category Integration - Category Consumer - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t OPCO : {0}".format(OPCO))
logger.info("\t TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_PATH.format(opco = OPCO)))
logger.info("\t TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PATH.format(opco = OPCO)))
logger.info("\t TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH.format(opco = OPCO)))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")
**CATALOG ATTRIBUTE AND ATTRIBUTE VALUE DATA LOAD INTO DATAFRAMES**

ds_catalog_attribute = spark \
    .read \
    .format("delta") \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_PATH.format(opco = OPCO))

ds_catalog_attribute_value = spark \
    .read \
    .format("delta") \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CATALOG_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_PATH.format(opco = OPCO))

logger.info("load-data : catalog-attribute, catalog-attribute-value loaded from master")
**JOIN AND FILTER SOURCE CATALOG ATTRIBUTE,ATTRIBUTE VALUE DATA & SELECT REQUIRED COLUMNS DATA**

import pyspark.sql.functions as F

logger.info("integrate : Started integrating catalog-attribute, catalog-attribute-value")

ds_category_consumer=ds_catalog_attribute.join(ds_catalog_attribute_value,ds_catalog_attribute.atr_id==ds_catalog_attribute_value.atr_id) \
                    .filter(ds_catalog_attribute.atr_id == VAR_ATR_ID) \
                    .filter(ds_catalog_attribute.atr_type_cd == VAR_ATR_TYPE_CD) \
                    .select(ds_catalog_attribute_value.atr_val_id.alias("id"), \
                     ds_catalog_attribute.atr_id.alias("attributeId"), \
                     F.when(ds_catalog_attribute_value.lvl_id.isNotNull(),ds_catalog_attribute_value.lvl_id.cast('long')) \
                     .otherwise(0).alias("levelId"), \
                     ds_catalog_attribute_value.othr_key_id.alias("categoryId"), \
                     ds_catalog_attribute.atr_name_cd.alias("attributeName"), \
                     F.when(ds_catalog_attribute_value.atr_val_cd.isNotNull(),ds_catalog_attribute_value.atr_val_cd.cast('long')) \
                     .otherwise(0).alias("attributeValue"), \
                     ds_catalog_attribute.atr_type_cd.alias("attributeType")

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp

ds_category_consumer_result=ds_category_consumer \
    .withColumn(colName="lastModified",col=current_timestamp())

logger.info("enrich : enriched catalog-consumer-attribute with lastModified attribute")

from delta.tables import DeltaTable

def save_category_consumer_result(df_category_consumer_rs):
    df_category_consumer_rs \
                    .sort(KEY_COL) \
                    .write \
                    .mode("overwrite") \
                    .option("mergeSchema","True") \
                    .format("delta") \
                    .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH.format(opco = OPCO)) 
    logger.info("\t Category consumer master data is overrided.OPCO = {0}, Count = {1}".format(OPCO, df_category_consumer_rs.count()))

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH.format(opco = OPCO))):
    logger.info("\t Category consumer master data already exists.")
    df_old_category_consumer_result = spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CATEGORY_CONSUMAR_PATH.format(opco = OPCO))
    logger.debug("\t Category image master data loaded for validation. count={0}".format(df_old_category_consumer_result.count()))
    is_val_success = validate_count(df_old_category_consumer_result, ds_category_consumer_result, VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
    if is_val_success:
        logger.info("\t Category consumer master data threshold validation is Successful")
        save_category_consumer_result(ds_category_consumer_result)
    else:
        logger.error("\t Failed to override master since variantion is exceding the threshold")
        raise Exception("EXCEEDING_CNT_THRESHOLD")
else:
    logger.info("\t Category consumer master data not exists.")
    save_category_consumer_result(ds_category_consumer_result)
